troparia: (Tone 4) God of our fathers, You always treat us fairly.* Deprive us not of Your mercy,* but by their prayers direct our lives in peace.
kontakia: (Tone 8) You enlightened the assemble of the God-bearers* as the preaches of piety* and tamers of impiety* who shine upon the world.* By their prayers,* preserve in perfect peace* those who magnify You, O Lord.* Alleluia.
